channel.title: gym on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in gym on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Good Physique & Polio-stricken Chicken's Leg
item.description: I don’t know whether to be happy or doubtful when a stranger walks up to me in the gym and Stranger <div class='sep'> : </div> <div class='text'>Hey</div> </li> <li> <div class='person'>Me</div> <div class='sep'> : </div> <div class='text'>Hi</div> </li> <li> <div class='person'>Stranger</div> <div class='sep'> : </div> <div class='text'>You are regular here?</div> </li> <li> <div class='person'>Me</div> <div class='sep'> : </div> <div class='text'>(have you ever seen me here earlier?) No. Second day in this gym.
